task_summary: Remove the lid from the pot, place the pot on the round plate, then use the spatula to push the pot toward the front edge of the table, and retreat.

task_long_description.overview: The scene shows a tabletop with a small pot (initially lidded) on a brown board, a round plate to its left, and a slotted spatula tool on the far left. A manipulator executes three sub-tasks: open the pot by removing its lid, reposition the pot onto the plate, and finally push the pot forward using the spatula. Motions should remain tidy and avoid collisions with nearby fixtures (burner pads) while maintaining visibility of target objects.
preconditions: Robot arm is homed and workspace calibrated
Pot, lid, plate, and spatula are within reachable workspace
No obstacles blocking straight pushes toward table front
stepwise_plan: Open the pot by removing the lid
Place the pot on the plate
Push the pot forward using the spatula
Retreat a short distance and pause
success_criteria: Lid is no longer on the pot
Pot is centered on the plate
Pot has been pushed toward the table front (downward in the frames)
Arm ends in a safe, non-contact pose
failure_and_recovery: If opening the lid fails, re-approach and retry opening
If pot slips during placement, re-place on plate
If push deviates, re-align and push again
task_long_description.termination: End after retreat and a brief wait once the pot is on the plate and pushed toward the table front.

frame_3.now_evidence: First clear interaction aligning pot over the plate, consistent with the mid-step placement.
frame_3.predicts_next: Suggests subsequent completion of placement then tool-use pushing action.

task_instruction: Take the lid off the pot, put the pot on the plate, and use the tool to push to pot to the front of the table.

node_specs.description: Push pot toward table front using the spatula.
Back off to a safe pose.
Brief pause to stabilize end state.

failure_modes: Lid opening fails due to friction
Push direction wrong or insufficient distance
recovery_strategy: Re-place pot with gentle press force 10
Repeat push with corrected direction 180 and distance 0.20
Fallback to alternative tool if available
assumptions: 'PlaceOnSurface' abstracts pick-and-place without explicitly modeling grasp; frames support this simplification.
Direction_deg=180 is mapped to pushing toward the image bottom (table front).
